con:part.con:content: <definitions name="citizenContactService" targetNamespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/citizencontactservice/interfaces" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/citizencontactservice/interfaces" xmlns:contact="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/citizencontactservice/interfaces" xmlns:common="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces"> <types> <xs:schema> <xs:import namespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/citizencontactservice/interfaces" schemaLocation="../schemas/citizenContact.xsd"/> </xs:schema> <xs:schema> <xs:import namespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces" schemaLocation="../../../../../commonService/src/main/resources/schemas/common.xsd"/> </xs:schema> </types> <message name="faultMsg"> <part name="params" element="common:faultMessage"/> </message> <message name="addContactRequestMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:addContactRequest"/> </message> <message name="addContactResponseMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:addContactResponse"/> </message> <message name="getContactRequestMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:getContactRequest"/> </message> <message name="getContactResponseMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:getContactResponse"/> </message> <message name="getAllContactsRequestMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:getAllContactsRequest"/> </message> <message name="getAllContactsResponseMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:getAllContactsResponse"/> </message> <message name="updateContactRequestMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:updateContactRequest"/> </message> <message name="updateContactResponseMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:updateContactResponse"/> </message> <message name="deleteContactRequestMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:deleteContactRequest"/> </message> <message name="deleteContactResponseMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:deleteContactResponse"/> </message> <message name="searchByNameRequestMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:searchByNameRequest"/> </message> <message name="searchByNameResponseMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:searchByNameResponse"/> </message> <message name="searchByCategoryRequestMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:searchByCategoryRequest"/> </message> <message name="searchByCategoryResponseMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:searchByCategoryResponse"/> </message> <message name="searchByContactRequestMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:searchByContactRequest"/> </message> <message name="searchByContactResponseMsg"> <part name="params" element="contact:searchByContactResponse"/> </message> <portType name="CitizenContactServicePort"> <operation name="addContact"> <input message="tns:addContactRequestMsg"/> <output message="tns:addContactResponseMsg"/> <fault name="faultMsg" message="tns:faultMsg"/> </operation> <operation name="getContact"> <input message="tns:getContactRequestMsg"/> <output message="tns:getContactResponseMsg"/> <fault name="faultMsg" message="tns:faultMsg"/> </operation> <operation name="getAllContacts"> <input message="tns:getAllContactsRequestMsg"/> <output message="tns:getAllContactsResponseMsg"/> <fault name="faultMsg" message="tns:faultMsg"/> </operation> <operation name="updateContact"> <input message="tns:updateContactRequestMsg"/> <output message="tns:updateContactResponseMsg"/> <fault name="faultMsg" message="tns:faultMsg"/> </operation> <operation name="deleteContact"> <input message="tns:deleteContactRequestMsg"/> <output message="tns:deleteContactResponseMsg"/> <fault name="faultMsg" message="tns:faultMsg"/> </operation> <operation name="searchByName"> <input message="tns:searchByNameRequestMsg"/> <output message="tns:searchByNameResponseMsg"/> <fault name="faultMsg" message="tns:faultMsg"/> </operation> <operation name="searchByCategory"> <input message="tns:searchByCategoryRequestMsg"/> <output message="tns:searchByCategoryResponseMsg"/> <fault name="faultMsg" message="tns:faultMsg"/> </operation> <operation name="searchByContact"> <input message="tns:searchByContactRequestMsg"/> <output message="tns:searchByContactResponseMsg"/> <fault name="faultMsg" message="tns:faultMsg"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="citizenContactServiceSOAPBinding" type="tns:CitizenContactServicePort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="addContact"> <soap:operation soapAction="addContact"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> <operation name="getContact"> <soap:operation soapAction="getContact"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> <operation name="getAllContacts"> <soap:operation soapAction="getAllContacts"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> <operation name="updateContact"> <soap:operation soapAction="updateContact"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> <operation name="deleteContact"> <soap:operation soapAction="deleteContact"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> <operation name="searchByName"> <soap:operation soapAction="searchByName"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> <operation name="searchByCategory"> <soap:operation soapAction="searchByCategory"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> <operation name="searchByContact"> <soap:operation soapAction="searchByContact"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> </binding> <service name="CitizenContactService"> <port name="CitizenContactServicePort" binding="tns:citizenContactServiceSOAPBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8083/oscs/citizenContactServices"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/citizencontactservice/interfaces" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/citizencontactservice/interfaces" xmlns:common="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces"> <xs:import namespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces" schemaLocation="../../../../../commonService/src/main/resources/schemas/common.xsd"/> <xs:simpleType name="category"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Education"/> <xs:enumeration value="Environment"/> <xs:enumeration value="Health"/> <xs:enumeration value="Miscellaneous"/> <xs:enumeration value="National"/> <xs:enumeration value="Security"/> <xs:enumeration value="Woman and child"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="contactDetails"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="uid" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="category" type="tns:category"/> <xs:element name="contactNo" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="contactList"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contacts" type="tns:contactDetails" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="columnToBeSorted"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Category"/> <xs:enumeration value="Name"/> <xs:enumeration value="Contact Number"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="sortOrder"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Ascending"/> <xs:enumeration value="Descending"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="searchByNameDetails"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="columnToBeSorted" type="tns:columnToBeSorted"/> <xs:element name="sortOrder" type="tns:sortOrder"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="searchByCategoryDetails"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="category" type="tns:category"/> <xs:element name="columnToBeSorted" type="tns:columnToBeSorted"/> <xs:element name="sortOrder" type="tns:sortOrder"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="searchByContactDetails"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contact" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="columnToBeSorted" type="tns:columnToBeSorted"/> <xs:element name="sortOrder" type="tns:sortOrder"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="addContactRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactDetails" type="tns:contactDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="addContactResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactDetails" type="tns:contactDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getContactRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="uid" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getContactResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactDetails" type="tns:contactDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getAllContactsRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence></xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getAllContactsResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactList" type="tns:contactList"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="updateContactRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactDetails" type="tns:contactDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="updateContactResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactDetails" type="tns:contactDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="deleteContactRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="uid" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="deleteContactResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactDetails" type="tns:contactDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchByNameRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="searchByNameDetails" type="tns:searchByNameDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchByNameResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactList" type="tns:contactList"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchByCategoryRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="searchByCategoryDetails" type="tns:searchByCategoryDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchByCategoryResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactList" type="tns:contactList"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchByContactRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="searchByContactDetails" type="tns:searchByContactDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchByContactResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactList" type="tns:contactList"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces"> <xs:element name="faultMessage"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="message" type="tns:message"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="serviceStatus"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="tns:status"/> <xs:element name="code" type="tns:code"/> <xs:element name="message" type="tns:message"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="status"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="OK"/> <xs:enumeration value="CREATED"/> <xs:enumeration value="NO CONTENT"/> <xs:enumeration value="UPDATED"/> <xs:enumeration value="DELETED"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAILED"/> <xs:enumeration value="AUTHENTICATION_FAILED"/> <xs:enumeration value="AUTHENTICATION_SUCCESSFUL"/> <xs:enumeration value="SQL_QUERY_FAILURE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="code"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="RC: 200"/> <xs:enumeration value="RC: 201"/> <xs:enumeration value="RC: 204"/> <xs:enumeration value="RC: 400"/> <xs:enumeration value="RC: 450"/> <xs:enumeration value="RC: 498"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="message"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully added a new user!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Failed to add a user!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully fetched the user details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully fetched the list of user details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Failed to fetch the list of user details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="No user found!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully updated the user!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Failed to update the user!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully deleted the user details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="No user found to be deleted!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully added a new contact!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Failed to add a contact!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully fetched the contact details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully fetched the list of contact details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Failed to fetch the list of contact details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="No contact found!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully updated the contact!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Failed to update the contact!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully deleted the contact details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="No contact found to be deleted!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Email not found!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Mobile number not found!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Incorrect password!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully logged in!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully logged out!"/> <xs:enumeration value="No user found to log out!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully validated the user session!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Invalid user session!"/> <xs:enumeration value="No match Found!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully fetched the search results!"/> <xs:enumeration value="SQL Query Fault!"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>
